Xubuntu: Open Whisker Menu with the Windows key

Posted on June 26, 2014

Menu: Settings Manager -&gt; Keyboard -&gt; Application Shortcuts: xfce4-popup-whiskermenu and click the Windows Key (Super_L)

Posted on June 10, 2014
